lines.text:
[to Lt. Lopez]
A brave and silent soldier. We shall see how long you can remain brave and silent.
lines.character: Crito Damou aka Omar Ben Khalif

lines.text:
[to Paul Lartal]
I could force you to come with me, but we prefer that you come with us willingly.

[to Paul Lartal]
Oh, I've forgotten to tell you. You were tried this morning by my followers. A fair trial. The verdict was unanimous. Death by stoning.
lines.character: Crito Damou aka Omar Ben Khalif
